topic.title: Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (Third Edition)
topic.shortdesc: The Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (Third Edition) is a standard series of measurements used primarily to assess the motor (fine and gross), language (receptive and expressive), and cognitive development of infants and toddlers, ages 0-3.
